Title: Day 5: 12:00 P.M.-1:00 P.M.
Plot:
Jack contacts Mike and asks for a secret meeting in hopes of gathering evidence against Walt. 

Martha begs Aaron for help, while a desperate Walt tries to force Logan to aid him in his complicity with the terrorists. 

Buchanan butts heads with Lynn over a decision to violate the president's orders, while the Russians attempt to escape with the nerve gas.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence and content that may disturb
GuestStars: Benjamin Parrillo,  Timothy V. Murphy,  Brady Corbet,  Connie Britton,  Michael Karawia,  Terry Woodberry,  Michael Yavnieli,  Matt Huhn,  Anita Finlay
